name: Get That Gold
description:
Get that Gold! and get out with it. This is a fan-made version of payday2's Bank Heist gold. Kill the security, drill the safe door, kill some cops and secure your reward.

Commands:

F:Open doors, set the drill.
G: Get your weapon  (you need to do this before opening any doors)
LMB: Shoot
WASD: Move
Z:Easter egg(30 secs of cooldown)
